name: faktory
description: Turn Invoices into Yield. Automatically. Built for Mantle Global Hackathon 2025.

scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter faktory-app tsc --noEmit && pnpm --filter faktory-agent tsc --noEmit
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter faktory-app lint && cd contracts && forge fmt --check
scripts.deploy:local: cd contracts && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol --rpc-url http://127.0.0.1:8545 --broadcast
scripts.deploy:factory: cd contracts && forge script script/DeployFactory.s.sol --rpc-url http://127.0.0.1:8545 --broadcast
scripts.deploy:mantle-sepolia: cd contracts && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol --rpc-url https://rpc.sepolia.mantle.xyz --broadcast
